data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Belokobylskij, Sergey A. (2016): New South African species of the genus Idiasta Foerster, 1863 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae), with a key to the Afrotropical and Malagasy taxa. Zootaxa 4150 (5): 566-570, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.5.3|10 occurrences
